api_list.name: Get the top most-played albums
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://apple-marketing-tools.p.rapidapi.com/gh/music/most-played/10/albums.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "apple-marketing-tools.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://apple-marketing-tools.p.rapidapi.com/{storefront}/music/most-played/{limit}/albums.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "apple-marketing-tools.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get the top most-played songs.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://apple-marketing-tools.p.rapidapi.com/gh/music/most-played/10/songs.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "apple-marketing-tools.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
